actions.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) radiant damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: The dragon exhales a flashing mote of radiant energy that travels to a point the dragon can see within 180 feet of itself, then blossoms into a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Each creature in the sphere must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Photonic Breath (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description: The dragon makes one Tail attack.
actions.name: Tail Attack

actions.description: The dragon emits magical light in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in this area must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Blinding Brilliance (Costs 2 Actions)

specialTraits.description: The dragon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
specialTraits.name: Flyby

specialTraits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)

specialTraits.description: Magical attempts to read the dragon's mind or glean its thoughts fail automatically.
specialTraits.name: Nebulous Thoughts

specialTraits.description: The dragon deals double damage to objects and structures.
specialTraits.name: Siege Monster
